title: Mecha Khazix Particles missing
body: this has been going on for a long time, the old mecha khazix has the jatpack animation when walking if you have evolved your e, now you can not see the flames anymore, also before i believe sometime there is a warning sigh appears and now it is also completely gone, still i think this is a good 1350 rp skin but riot i would love them back{{champion:121}} {{item:3147}} {{item:1412}} {{item:3074}} {{item:3071}}{{item:3053}} {{item:2140}}  red build for life.
